name: .S2ML File Extension
summary: Learn about .S2ML files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Language-specific XML file used by StarCraft II: Wings of Liberty, an outer space strategy game where players compete as the Protoss, Terran, and Zerg races; contains a list of text strings in a specific language; used for localizing StarCraft II maps while playing the game.

content: In Windows Vista and Windows 7, S2ML files can be found in the subdirectories of the following directory:[user]\​AppData\​Local\​Blizzard Entertainment\​Battle.net\​Cache\​
In Mac OS X, they can be found in the subdirectories of this directory: [user]/​Shared/​Blizzard/​Battle.net/​Cache/​
NOTE: Since S2ML files are stored using XML formatting, you can open them with any text editor.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
